original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The strike action launched by Sri Lanka Telecom workers continues for the 9th day, on Friday (22).
President of the All Telecom Employees Union Jagath Gurusinghe said the SLT Board of Directors that convened on Thursday (21) failed to provide an acceptable solution to their demands.
He added that the strike was launched against the privatization of the Sri Lanka Telecom and the current administration.
